name: Oskay's Adventure
description:
A chaotic platformer with cute characters and story.

[IMPORTANT]

MAKE SURE TO GET THE LAST CHECKPOINT BEFORE ENTERING THE HOUSE ELSE YOU MAY FACE A BUG

Skill based gameplay, dodge arrows coming from.... wait what? ALL DIRECTIONS?!

A simple boss stage with one hit win system.

Multiple Music tracks and sound effects to keep the immersive feel going.

Simple controls and short gameplay to just pick up and play.

Save system so you never lose your progress and don't have to start all over again!

And ofcourse a reset button for those who want the experience all over again!

Lets see how quick u can finish the game? or can u even finish??

{Hint : Figure out the shooting pattern before leaping}

Controls:

A and D or Left Arrow key and Right Arrow key to move left or right.

w or Space to jump {Remember u can double jump}

S or Left Shift to Crouch 

And that's it you are all set!
